text: GSK would be a great one, they are one of our customers and most of my colleagues have worked for GSK in the past and said they really look after their employees. It also would look great on your cv.....

You can put things on your cv that aren't necessarily work related but show your team leadership in other aspects for example I put on my cv that I ran a tennis team. Considering you haven't had experience in pharmaceuticals you should try and prove that you are interested rather than them taking your word for it.
You should put that you have used prospela and been linked with a pharmaceutical professional to gain advise and insight.
This shows you have been proactive in learning more about the industry.
